project_name.justification: The project is initially called the 'Neal Idaho Project' and is later renamed: 'the Company is changing the name of the Neal Project to the Golden Trove Project.' It is also referenced as the 'Golden Trove (Neal) Project'.

company_name.justification: Galleon Gold Corp. (TSXV: GGO) (the "Company" or "Galleon Gold") is pleased to announce that it has closed the previously announced transaction...

ceo_buyer.justification: R. David Russell Chairman and CEO

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction with Daisy Mining converts a lease agreement into full ownership. 'Once a total of US$1,250,000 has been paid, the NSR and tonnage fee will be extinguished and Golden Trove will own the property 100%.' This represents the final potential ownership.

primary_commodity.justification: The Project is a high-grade gold-dominant vein system with at least five veins known to date.

verified_article_link.justification: The article, titled 'Galleon Gold Completes Neal Project Acquisition...', is about the correct project and company.

currency.justification: The cash consideration portion of the overall project acquisition is explicitly denominated in US dollars: '5 yearly payments of US $250,000 to Daisy... for a total consideration of US $1,250,000.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: As part of a purchase agreement with Daisy Mining & Land LLP, Galleon Gold's subsidiary will make '5 yearly payments of US $250,000 to Daisy starting May 1, 2024 and ending May 1, 2028, for a total consideration of US $1,250,000.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The share payment is defined by the number of shares issued and a price per share, not a total raw value, following the financial extraction hierarchy (Priority 2).

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Cash and share components of the overall project acquisition are detailed separately across two transactions.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: In a transaction with a vendor controlled by Eric Sprott, 'The Company has issued 2,000,000 common shares of Galleon Gold (the "Shares") to the Vendor'.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No warrants were mentioned as part of the acquisition consideration in the provided text.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text mentions a grant of 100,000 stock options, but this was to a consultant and not part of the M&A consideration for the project.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued (2,000,000), but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.25'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the purchase agreement, the seller (Daisy) retains a royalty that is later extinguished: 'During the term of the Purchase Agreement, Daisy will receive... a 3% NSR on any ore processed. Once a total of US$1,250,000 has been paid, the NSR and tonnage fee will be extinguished...'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The total area is the sum of the patented claims (22.4 hectares) and unpatented claims (52.6 hectares) mentioned in the text: 'five private patented mining claims covering approximately 22.4 hectares (55.38 acres) and another seven unpatented lode claims covering about 52.6 hectares (130 acres)'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The units for the project area are given in hectares: '...22.4 hectares... and another seven unpatented lode claims covering about 52.6 hectares...'

resource_size.justification: A historical estimate for a stockpile on the property is quantified: 'Results of the sampling indicate the Stockpile graded at 0.132 opt (4.54 gpt Au), equivalent to approximately 1,835 ounces of gold in-situ.' The text notes this is not a current mineral resource.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly stated: 'Galleon Gold Corp. (TSXV: GGO)'.
